name: @scbd/eco-molecule-add-to-calendar

scripts.build: yarn build:lib && yarn build:wc && yarn build:wca && yarn build:mixin:lib
scripts.build:lib: vue-cli-service build src/components/index.vue --target lib --name AddToCalendar --dest dist/vue
scripts.build:mixin:lib: vue-cli-service build src/mixin/docs-mixin.js --target lib --name DocsMixin --dest dist/docs/
scripts.build:wc: vue-cli-service build src/components/index.vue --target wc --name Add-To-Calendar --dest dist/wc/
scripts.build:wca: vue-cli-service build src/components/index.vue --target wc-async --name Add-To-Calendar --dest dist/wca/

description: Vue component to display 'subscribe to events' or 'event streams' into popular calendar clients.
